scripts.start-all: npm run start-identity-server && npm run start-webapi && npm run start-client && npm run start-webapi-client && npm run start-hybrid-client
scripts.start-identity-server: cd Practice.Samples.IdentityServer4 && dotnet build && dotnet run
scripts.start-webapi: cd Practice.IdServer4.WebAPI && dotnet build && dotnet run
scripts.start-client: cd Practice.IdServer4.Client && dotnet build && dotnet run
scripts.start-webapi-client: cd Practice.IdServer4.WebAPI.Client && dotnet build && dotnet run
scripts.start-hybrid-client: cd Practice.IdServer4.HybridClient && dotnet build && dotnet run
